name: Owietmagwyaan
description:
"one week isnt enough to make a game when you are a noob"

Story: You were assassinated by cyber witch, but your consciosness was uploaded to a computer. Now you are able to hack into minds after you die. Your ultimate goal now is revenge!

Controls:
Up/Down/Right/Left: Move
Space: Attack

A Game Made by  Shakespearian Apes
The Apes:

Game design, Art, Animations : dunkelgrau and worm
Programing : Dartian, Otwald, igchrono
Music : adikar1
